title: Affirmations
description: Gain self confidence, improve how you tackle and improve your mental health and foster the ability to think and learn from your past to improve your future

title: Coffee Connection
description: A full stack MERN application built on top of Yelps Fusion Business Search API.

title: TaskManage
description: A MERN application that allows for rich text editing for custom notes and managing tasks to keep users acountable for the things they want to achieve.

title: CoinSight
description: React application using the CoinGecko API and ChartJS to do data visualizations of Crypto Currency price fluctuations over time

title: Baysbook
description: A full stack MERN application that allows the students of CSU East Bay to connect

title: YouTube Clone
description: A frontend web application leveraging React and the YouTube API for querying user video searches and playing them in the browser

title: Movie Finder
description: A frontend web application using the TMDb Movie Search API to render out movies with keyword search or top trending movies in the US
